name: Notion Essential Resume Template | Resume Template | Notion Template
description: The Essential Resume Template Pack for Notion is a powerful tool that can help you create a professional and polished resume in minutes. The pack includes two resume templates, each with 9 key drag-and-drop, pre-built sections that are designed to make you shine.Resume A is an all-in-one, classic resume design with a modern minimalist twist. It prioritizes your past experience and even offers room for your very own Notion avatar. This template is perfect for anyone who wants to create a traditio
features: A detailed custom PDF export guide; Easy sharing via URL to your future employer; A step-by-step guide for adding your own Notion avatar; Helpful, detailed tooltips and onboarding; You can create a professional and polished resume in minutes.; The templates are highly customizable so you can create a resume that is perfect for your unique skills and experience.; The templates are easy to use, even if you're not familiar with Notion.; The templates are mobile-friendly so you can easily share your resume with potential employers on the go.; The templates come with a variety of helpful features, such as a custom PDF export guide, easy sharing, and onboarding instructions.; Name:Your name and contact information
